text: Boys in Brown is a 1949 British crime drama movie directed by Montgomery Tully and was based on the 1940 play of the same name by Reginard Beckwith. It stars Jack Warner, Richard Attenborough, Dirk Bogarde, Jimmy Hanley, Barbara Murray, Patrick Holt, Graham Payn. ==Other websites== * *Boys in Brown at BFI Screenonline Category:1949 crime drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Montgomery Tully
title: Boys in Brown
